name: Max
description: Max is a fluffy and playful dog. He loves belly rubs and enjoys going on long walks in the park. He's the perfect companion for an active family.

name: Poko
description: Poko is a small and energetic dog with a big personality. He's always up for an adventure and loves to play fetch. He'll bring endless joy and laughter to your home.

name: Robin
description: Robin is a graceful and independent cat. She enjoys lounging in the sun and chasing after feathers. With her soft purrs and gentle nature, she'll be a calming presence in your life.

name: Frank
description: Frank is a loyal and protective dog. He's great with kids and will always keep a watchful eye on your family. His playful antics and unwavering devotion will melt your heart.

name: Oscar
description: Oscar is a friendly and outgoing dog. He loves meeting new people and making friends wherever he goes. With his wagging tail and infectious enthusiasm, he'll bring happiness to your home.

name: Augustus
description: Augustus is a gentle giant with a heart of gold. Despite his size, he's incredibly gentle and loves to cuddle. He'll be your loyal companion and provide endless love and comfort.

name: Lando
description: Lando is a mischievous and playful cat. He's always ready to pounce on his favorite toys and explore every nook and cranny. His playful antics will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Percy
description: Percy is a smart and obedient dog. He's quick to learn new tricks and loves to show off his skills. With his intelligence and charm, he'll be the star of any training session.
